notesStmt.note: This incomplete text claims affiliation with the Ḍāmaratantra (colophon, f. 5r) as well as Rudrayāmala (f. 2v). Title from colophon, f. 5r.
Fair condition. Paper brown and heavily darkened with smudged ink. Orange powder rubbed in over invocation and some words. Mistakes blotched out with black. Marginal correction.

Begins: oṁ śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ śivāya namaḥ asya śrīpārthiveśvaraciṁtāmaṇividyāmantrasya nigrahānugrahakarttāvrahmāṛṣaye namaḥ śirasi gāyatrochandase namaḥ mukhe sarvakāmadughāsvarūpiṇīpārthiveśvaraciṁtāmaṇidevatāyai namaḥ hrauṁ vījaṁ namaḥ guhye.
Colophon (f. 2v): iti śrīrudrayāmale kāmake ḍāmatantre sāre pārthiveśvarapūjāvidhiḥ samāptā.
Colophon (f. 5r): iti ḍāmaratantr[e] śivanāradasaṁvāde pārthiveśvaracintāmanau vaidikaprakāraḥ samāptaḥ.
Ends (f. 5v): atha ācāramayūṣe ākṣād alpaparimāṇaṁ na liṁgam kutran naraḥ kurvītāṁguṣṭato hrasvaṁ na kadācit samarcayet.
